summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department; providing for the improvement and rerouting of Meridian Avenue North, relocation of sanitary sewers and watermains, construction of storm drains, sidewalks, safety lighting system and landscaping in the vicinity of the North Seattle Community College site, making a reimbursable appropriation from the Water Fund and partially reimbursable appropriations from the Sewer Fund and City Street Fund therefor.
